item.title: The Importance of R and Python
item.description: Before I started my computational biology course, I had a very limited experience with coding in general. I got a taste of it when I was enrolled in biostatistics last year, but it never truly occurred me how much the things I learned applied to the world outside of science. And yes, science is wonderful and all, but thereâ€™s so much more to statistical analysis than that.
